thumb.title: Business Cards
thumb.text: A two sided Business Card for the Financial Company Ariel Finans that match their logo.

page.subTitle: Ariel Finans â€“ Finance and Investment Company
page.text: Business Cards for the Financial Company Ariel Finans. They needed a serious looking business card to match their logo. I designed both sides with different combinations of the same colors as in the logo. I further used the shape of the logo to achieve some interesting background effects.
